title: program-header
description: Why Study Elementary School in Sta. Ana Central?

title: program-content
description: Sta. Ana Central Elementary School is a great place for children to begin their learning journey. We provide a strong foundation in academics, values, and life skills through quality education and caring teachers. Our school is known for its safe and welcoming environment where students are encouraged to be curious, creative, and confident. With support from both the school and the community, every child is given the opportunity to grow and reach their full potential. At Sta. Ana Central, we believe in shaping young minds and preparing them for a bright future.

title: core-subject-description-1
description: At Sta. Ana Central Elementary School, Mathematics is more than just numbers – it's a way of thinking and solving problems. We help students build strong math skills through fun, engaging, and practical activities that make learning exciting. Our dedicated teachers guide students step by step, making sure they understand basic concepts and can apply them in real life. Whether it’s through games, group work, or hands-on exercises, we make math meaningful and enjoyable. We aim to boost every child’s confidence in solving problems and prepare them for success in the next stages of learning.

title: core-subject-description-2
description: Science at Sta. Ana Central Elementary School sparks curiosity and encourages young minds to explore the world around them. Through fun experiments, hands-on activities, and exciting lessons, students learn how things work and why they happen. Our teachers create a learning environment where questions are welcome, and discovery is part of every lesson. From understanding nature and the human body to exploring weather, energy, and space, we help students build a strong foundation in science. We aim to develop critical thinking and a love for learning that will guide them as future scientists, innovators, and problem-solvers.

title: core-subject-description-3
description: At Sta. Ana Central Elementary School, we believe that strong English skills open doors to many opportunities. Our English program helps students become confident readers, writers, speakers, and listeners. Through stories, reading activities, writing exercises, and fun games, we make learning the language enjoyable and meaningful. We focus on building vocabulary, grammar, comprehension, and communication skills in ways that are easy to understand and apply. With the guidance of our caring teachers, students are encouraged to express themselves clearly and creatively, preparing them to succeed in school and in life.

title: core-subject-description-4
description: Sa Sta. Ana Central Elementary School, pinapahalagahan namin ang kahalagahan ng wikang Filipino bilang bahagi ng ating pagkakakilanlan at kultura. Sa asignaturang Filipino, tinuturuan ang mga mag-aaral na maging mahusay sa pagbasa, pagsulat, pakikinig, at pagsasalita. Sa pamamagitan ng mga kwento, tula, laro, at makabuluhang gawain, mas nagiging masaya at madali ang pagkatuto ng wika. Nilalayon naming hubugin ang kanilang kakayahang magpahayag ng damdamin at kaisipan sa paraang malinaw at epektibo. Sa tulong ng aming mga guro, ang mga bata ay natututo hindi lamang ng wika kundi ng pagmamahal sa ating kultura at bayan.

title: core-subject-description-5
description: Sa Sta. Ana Central Elementary School, ang Araling Panlipunan ay nagtuturo sa mga mag-aaral ng kahalagahan ng kasaysayan, kultura, pamahalaan, at lipunan. Sa tulong ng makabuluhang aralin at aktibidad, natututo ang mga bata tungkol sa kanilang komunidad, bansa, at ang papel nila bilang mamamayan. Pinapalawak ng asignaturang ito ang kanilang pag-unawa sa mga isyung panlipunan at tinuturuan silang maging responsable, makatao, at makabansang indibidwal. Sa bawat aralin, hinihikayat namin ang mga mag-aaral na maging mapanuri, may malasakit, at aktibong kalahok sa pagbubuo ng mas maayos na lipunan.

title: overview-description
description: Sta. Ana Central Elementary School is a respected public school known for its dedication to academic excellence and values-based education. Guided by the K to 12 Curriculum, the school nurtures young learners through quality instruction, committed teachers, and strong community support. It continues to produce well-rounded students who grow into responsible and active members of society.

title: mission-description
description:
Sta. Ana Central Elementary School is dedicated to nurturing academically competent, values-driven, and socially responsible learners through quality education anchored on the K to 12 Curriculum. We commit to delivering inclusive, innovative, and engaging instruction supported by modern teaching strategies, active community involvement, and a safe, caring learning environment.

In response to the evolving needs of the 21st century, the school strives to develop well-rounded pupils equipped with critical thinking, collaboration, communication, and compassion—preparing them to become active contributors to nation-building and lifelong learners in a rapidly changing world.
